planet.name: OGLE-2013-BLG-0723LB b
planet.description: OGLE-2013-BLG-0723LBb is a Venus-mass planet orbiting a brown dwarf of 32 Jupiter masses, which is itself orbiting a low-mass star. It can therefore be considered either a scaled-up exommon system or a scaled-down planetary system. There is evidence that the system may also contain an additional, more luminous star around which the three known objects revolve.
